alert.note: Alert for Kit Carson County; Yuma County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 13 at 7:54PM MST until December 14 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST /6 PM CST/ WEDNESDAY... ...BLIZZARD WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...In Colorado, Yuma and Kit Carson Counties. In Kansas, Cheyenne and Sherman Counties. In Nebraska, Dundy County. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST /6 PM CST/ Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
